summary:
Sekuya Raises $1.6m Early Rounds to Build Anime Gaming Universe - Sekuya raises $1.6 million in early rounds to develop an anime gaming universe

 Sekuya Launchpad IDO with SingularityDAO Now Underway - Sekuya partners with SingularityDAO for Launchpad IDO

 Sekuya Partners with W3GG to Pioneer Cross-Platform Gaming Experience - Sekuya collaborates with W3GG for cross-platform gaming

 Sekuya Partners with CoinfestAsia 2024 - Sekuya joins hands with CoinfestAsia 2024

 Sekuya x Astra Nova Partnership - Sekuya announces partnership with Astra Nova
